original_text: Surely thou hast spoken in mine hearing, and I have heard the voice of thy words, saying,
korean_text: 그대는 실로 내가 듣는 데서 말하였고 나는 그대의 말소리를 들었느니라

sentences.original_text: Surely thou hast spoken in mine hearing,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내가 듣는 가운데 분명히 말하였고

sentences.original_text: and I have heard the voice of thy words,
